<h3 id="X39838">X(39838) = PARALLELOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-EXCENTERS-REFLECTIONS TO 7th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^8-4*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+(b^2+c^2)^2*a^4+2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2-(3*b^4-2*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(39838) = 3*X(3)-4*X(6721) = 4*X(3)-5*X(31274) = 2*X(3)-3*X(36519) = 3*X(4)-X(98) = 5*X(4)-X(9862) = 4*X(4)-X(10991) = 5*X(4)-2*X(11623) = 5*X(4)-3*X(14639) = 7*X(4)-3*X(14651) = 2*X(98)-3*X(115) = 5*X(98)-3*X(9862) = X(98)+3*X(10722) = 4*X(98)-3*X(10991) = 5*X(98)-6*X(11623) = 5*X(98)-9*X(14639) = 7*X(98)-9*X(14651) = 5*X(115)-2*X(9862) = X(115)+2*X(10722) = 5*X(115)-4*X(11623) = 5*X(115)-6*X(14639) = 7*X(115)-6*X(14651) = 16*X(6721)-15*X(31274) = 8*X(6721)-9*X(36519) = 5*X(31274)-6*X(36519)
</b>
<p>
The reciprocal parallelogic center of these triangles is X(6).</p>
<p>X(39838) lies on these lines: {2,38747}, {3,6721}, {4,32}, {5,38737}, {20,620}, {24,39860}, {25,39841}, {30,114}, {33,39844}, {34,39851}, {99,3146}, {147,543}, {148,17578}, {185,39835}, {235,39845}, {316,32458}, {376,9167}, {378,39854}, {381,6036}, {382,6033}, {542,1351}, {546,12042}, {550,38748}, {574,7694}, {671,5984}, {690,13202}, {868,35282}, {1498,39839}, {1503,1570}, {1513,6781}, {1569,38383}, {1593,39857}, {1597,3455}, {1656,38742}, {1657,15561}, {1699,11725}, {2023,22682}, {2453,10749}, {2456,29012}, {2777,15357}, {2782,3627}, {2797,38956}, {3091,6722}, {3529,20399}, {3534,38750}, {3832,14061}, {3839,5461}, {3843,38224}, {3845,6055}, {3850,34127}, {3851,38739}, {3853,22515}, {3858,15092}, {5059,38746}, {5073,38730}, {5076,12188}, {5182,14927}, {5480,14537}, {6054,13172}, {6564,8980}, {6565,13967}, {6776,11648}, {7517,39825}, {7823,36859}, {7983,9812}, {8724,15684}, {8781,32827}, {9756,18424}, {9880,15687}, {10304,22247}, {10352,33017}, {10353,33019}, {10721,11005}, {10728,10768}, {11001,23234}, {11177,36523}, {11381,39846}, {11403,39832}, {11424,39834}, {11439,39836}, {11455,39837}, {11470,39848}, {11471,39850}, {11473,39852}, {11474,39853}, {11475,39858}, {11476,39859}, {11632,38335}, {11710,18483}, {11711,28164}, {11724,18481}, {11737,26614}, {12007,39593}, {12091,18323}, {12184,12953}, {12185,12943}, {12324,39833}, {12355,35434}, {14269,14830}, {15545,38790}, {15640,36521}, {15704,38751}, {15811,39849}, {17800,38731}, {18534,39828}, {19055,23259}, {19056,23249}, {19124,39840}, {19169,39843}, {19416,39855}, {19417,39856}, {25486,32479}, {29317,35456}, {31723,39818}</p>
<p>
X(39838) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 10722}, {99, 3146}, {147, 10723}, {382, 6033}, {5073, 38730}, {6054, 15682}, {6321, 38744}, {8724, 15684}, {10721, 11005}, {10728, 10768}, {11381, 39846}, {15545, 38790}, {36961, 36962}<br>
X(39838) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (20, 620), (99, 38745), (114, 22505), (115, 4), (185, 39835), (1569, 38383), (1657, 38736), (6055, 3845), (6781, 1513), (9862, 11623), (9880, 15687), (10991, 115), (11177, 36523), (11710, 18483), (12042, 546), (12188, 38734), (14981, 6033), (15300, 6054), (18481, 11724), (22515, 3853), (38738, 114), (38741, 6036), (38749, 5), (39809, 3627)<br>
X(39838) = anticomplement of X(38747)<br>
X(39838) = polar-circle-inverse of-X(10735)<br>
X(39838) = X(20) of midpoint triangle of antipedal triangles of X(13) and X(14)<br>
X(39838) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 36519, 31274), (4, 9862, 14639), (5, 38749, 38737), (114, 38738, 2482), (147, 3543, 10723), (381, 38741, 6036), (546, 12042, 23514), (1657, 15561, 38736), (3091, 34473, 6722), (3830, 38744, 6321), (5073, 38743, 38730), (9862, 14639, 11623), (11623, 14639, 115), (12042, 23514, 38740)<br>
</p>
